objects.text:
• Multiple Drying Cycles for All Fabrics
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Digital LED Display with Time Status
• Large Capacity for Family-Sized Loads

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Clothes Dryer - Modern Laundry Made Simple
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Delicates
• ⚡ Energy-efficient operation with precise temperature control
• 🔄 Large capacity drum with spacious interior for family-sized loads
• 📱 Digital LED display showing remaining time and cycle status
• 🌟 Easy-access lint filter maintenance system
• 🔊 End-of-cycle signal to notify when clothes are done
• 💨 Advanced ventilation system for optimal drying performance
• 🛡️ Durable construction with reliable performance
• 🎛️ User-friendly control dial with multiple fabric care options
• 🚪 Wide-opening door for easy loading and unloading
• ♨️ Wrinkle prevention feature available

banner_details:
This banner has a clean, modern layout designed for promoting a household appliance, specifically a digital clothes dryer. Positioned prominently on the right side is a realistic product image ("product_image"), giving the design a focal point. On the left, the hierarchy of text elements leads with a bold and uppercase headline ("heading") followed by a sleek subheading ("subheading") in a modern font, both centered vertically for optimal readability. Below, a bulleted features list ("description") outlines product capabilities. The price ("price") is showcased in large, bold typography, and a rounded rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_background" with "cta") invites engagement. Aesthetic borders, soft background circles, and curved linear elements in the SVG ("background") enhance visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Royal Blue: `#1e40af` (primary for headings and accents)
- Sky Blue: `#3b82f6` (subheadings, SVG lines/circles)
- Dark Slate: `#1e293b` (bullet text)
- White: `#ffffff` (background and button text)
- Light Gray: `#f0f2f5` (outermost background)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern color palette dominated by crisp white (#FFFFFF), giving it a clean, fresh aesthetic ideal for home appliances. The door frame and interior use deep black (#1A1A1A), contrasting sharply with the white to accentuate key functional areas. Silver-gray (#C0C0C0) is used around the control knob, imparting a metallic, premium quality. The control panel includes subtle hues like light blue (#A0D8EF) and red (#E57373), which highlight modes and enhance user interactivity. These colors blend smoothly yet stand out individually by purpose—white provides neutrality, while black, silver, and color highlights add emphasis and guidance.
